GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.4.231
GSD.description:
net: mdio: validate parameter addr in mdiobus_get_phy()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.231 by commit 8a7b9560a3a8eb8724888c426e05926752f73aa0, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 7f854420fbfe9d49afe2ffb1df052cfe8e215541. For more details please see the references link.
